summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3692 , for the improvement of 37th Avenue South, from Hudson Street to Brandon Street; by the construction of concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45479 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
